author: Elias

text: Welp, I officially can't keep up with all the Pokémon releases! The Ruby version on the GBA is the last game in the series I put tons of hours in and almost 100%'d, so I have fond memories when listening to the remake's soundtrack. I always liked this little theme and this version is even better than the original, I love the percussion and the triangle mixed with the harp and bass.
author: SupraDarky

text: yeah same here. i never got a handheld after GBA so i havent played any of the new pokemon games. they look pretty fun though. but i kinda wish they would make a really nice looking pokemon game...maybe when nintendo makes a new console they will stick one on their with HD graphics.
author: VictorVonFox

text: @One Above All You really should get a 3DSXL and check out Pokemon Alpha Sapphire, it looks amazing, the graphics are crisp and really beautiful, it's the nicest looking and best feeling pokemon game I've played in a LONG time (Gen II was by far the best I'd played, then Gen III was nice, but definitely not my favourite, but these remakes make me have a whole new appreciation for Hoenn.)
author: Andoryuu

text: +SupraDarky I hope you get a chance to play these remakes. They are really well done, to include the soundtrack. Like you, Gen3 was the one i dumped the most hours into back then.
